patterns: I am good thanks for asking, yourself?

patterns: how can I access my module results?
Where can I see my results?
When will the results be available?
When can I see my results
responses: You can access your module results at any time by visiting https://www.uel.ac.uk/study/students/uel-direct is there anything else I can help you with today?

patterns: How can I access my timetable?
How can I check the timetable?
responses: You can access your timetable at any time by visiting this link! https://ueltt.uel.ac.uk/calendar for more inforamtion. What else can I assist you with today?

patterns: when does the student hub open?
what are the opening times for the student hub?
is the student hub available today?
responses: The Student Hub operates Monday to Friday 8:30am to 7pm, feel free to send an email if you need to contact them at thehub@uel.ac.uk

patterns: where can I get my student id card?
I have lost my id card, where can I get a replacement?
responses: If you are a new student, your ID card will be posted to your address, otherwise visit https://estore.uel.ac.uk/product-catalogue/student-support/replacement-id-card

patterns: How can I pay my tuitions fees?
when can I pay my tuition fees?
responses: Payments toward your tuition should be made using Flywire. Please visit https://www.uel.ac.uk/study/student-life/making-payment for more information.

patterns: where can I reset my password?
my password for my online account is not working
responses: If you are logging in for the first time please watch https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dQp9UjJPLss, otherwise visit https://passwordreset.microsoftonline.com/?whr=uel.ac.uk

patterns: Where can I find the canteen?
Does the university have a canteen?
Is the food at the canteen halal?
Is there halal food available in the canteen?
responses: UEL has an amazing canteen which is located on the bottom floor of the east building, there is also halal food selections available.
UEL has a great sports dock which is located towards the east side of the university, you can engage in multiple sports activities and visit our gym!
What do you call it when one IT professional gets surgeries on his fingers? It is called tech knuckle support!
Why was the new head IT official of IBM hospitalized? Because he didn't know and accidentally touched the firewall
